Labs

The labs at Michigan Medicine are at the heart of our research work. With 600+ labs in operation, we work across the realm of cutting-edge science.

Browse our labs

Departments

Throughout 20 clinical and nine basic science departments, teaching, research and clinical care often cross traditional departmental boundaries.

Browse our departments

Centers & Institutes

Our interdisciplinary centers, institutes and programs foster opportunities for creative research and educational collaborations.
